title: Real-time key display.
body: Hi, i'm a wanna be League recorder and i was wondering if anyone knows an application that will show the viewers whenever i press a key or click. I found a really good one on this application called Overwolf and it has this HUD Replay function that is perfect but it doesn't allow me to record full games. Please help.

replies.body:
I found a list of some [here](http://www.lassanamagassa.com/2014/09/7-apps-that-display-real-time-keystrokes-on-a-windows-pc-screen/) but some of the links may be outdated. Additionally, you may find some better answers on the [Twitch subreddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/twitch#shiny=t3_50hpqi) or on the [OBS Forums](https://obsproject.com/forum/). 

Let me know if this helped you out~
https://obsproject.com/ that might work for you
